function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cross-tabulation analysis reported moderate agreement with operational definitions of flourishing, potentially indicating subjective interpretation of the criteria.","Impact":"Inaccurate or inconsistent measurement of flourishing, leading to unreliable research outcomes.","Mitigation":"Provide clear and unambiguous operational definitions for flourishing criteria, and ensure consistent interpretation of responses.","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools, qualitative data analysis software.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, study participants.","Owner":"Research team, data collection and analysis personnel."},{"Description":"Coding criteria for positive characteristics, functioning, and emotion are complex and open to subjective interpretation, potentially leading to inconsistent coding and scoring.","Impact":"Inaccurate categorization of participants as flourishing or non-flourishing, resulting in biased or misleading results.","Mitigation":"Develop standardized coding guidelines and provide coder training to ensure consistent interpretation and application of coding criteria.","Technologies":"Coding software with built-in guidelines, intercoder reliability tools.","People":"Data coders, researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, data coding personnel."},{"Description":"Reliability of the flourishing scale and ESS data may be called into question if the operational definitions and coding criteria are unclear or inconsistently applied.","Impact":"Undermining the validity of research findings and conclusions based on the flourishing scale and ESS data.","Mitigation":"Conduct reliability checks, inter-rater agreement assessments, and sensitivity analyses to evaluate the impact of operational definition variability.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data visualization tools, reliability testing modules.","People":"Statisticians, data analysts, researchers.","Owner":"Research team, statistical analysis personnel."}]}
